document.title: Installation dUIMA sous Linux ( Suite)
document.author: Laurent
document.text:
Verifying Your Installation (extrait du README apache-uima documentAnalyzer.sh documentAnalyzer.sh Document Analyzer
Input Directory: UIMA_HOME/examples/data Output Directory: UIMA_HOME/examples/data/processed Location of Analysis Engine XML Descriptor: UIMA_HOME/examples/descriptors/analysis_engine/PersonTitleAnnotator.xml UIMA_HOME Run Analyzed Results View the examples code with Eclipse UIMA Overview SDK Setup 3.2. Setting up Eclipse to view Example Code
In Eclipse, if the Java perspective is not already open, switch to it by going to: Window Open Perspective Java Select the File Import Select General/Existing Project into Workspace Next Click Browse UIMA_HOME Click Finish uimaj-examples To verify that you have set up the project correctly, check that there are no error messages in the Problems UIMA Manuals and Guides Sommaire UIMA sur ce blog
